meanings.definition: A North American plant with pink flowers and winged stems.
meanings.sent1: The gaywings in the garden have beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: I spotted some lovely gaywings blooming in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the gaywings, enjoying the sweet nectar.
meanings.sent4: The gaywings stood out like delicate pink stars among the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: Her favorite flower was the gaywings because of its unique winged stems.

meanings.definition: A plant of the primrose family with pink flowers and winged stems.
meanings.sent1: During our nature walk, we found a patch of gaywings with vibrant pink petals.
meanings.sent2: The gaywings in the meadow added a splash of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels seemed to have a dance party around the gaywings, hopping from stem to stem.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the gaywings seemed to glow with a magical pink light.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a stunning picture of the gaywings in full bloom.
